name: ChatGPT Reasonable Contrast Dark Mode
author: Vic Ramon
description: Remeber the good old days, when ChatGPT's dark mode didn't burn out your retinas? Here at Simple Vic's web design, we do. What's old is new a again. Let the the warm taste of nostalgia wash over you. This mellow, reasonable contrast dark mode is a true taste of the good life. Now that's Simple Vic
